title: Calories in a Tortilla
meta_description: Discover calories in a tortilla, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for a standard flour tortilla, plus variations and FAQs.
assumptions: Medium 8-inch flour tortilla (~45 g), plain, no fillings or added fats; values based on common commercial brands.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (flour vs. corn), size, brand, and preparation; homemade or flavored versions differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard medium flour tortilla has about 140 kcal and 24 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a flour tortilla?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal for a medium 8-inch flour tortilla.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a tortilla?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g carbs per medium flour tortilla, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Calories in a corn tortilla vs. flour?
faqs.a: Corn tortillas are lower at ~80 kcal; flour is higher due to added fats.
